title: Computer program predicts risk of deadly irregular heart beats

title_detail.value: Computer program predicts risk of deadly irregular heart beats

summary: Combining a wealth of information derived from previous studies with data from more than 500 patients, an international team led by researchers has developed a computer-based set of rules that more accurately predicts when patients with a rare heart condition might benefit -- or not -- from lifesaving implanted defibrillators.

summary_detail.value: Combining a wealth of information derived from previous studies with data from more than 500 patients, an international team led by researchers has developed a computer-based set of rules that more accurately predicts when patients with a rare heart condition might benefit -- or not -- from lifesaving implanted defibrillators.
